smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onCreateDialog is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class Main is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class AppService is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.content.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.os.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
org.blitzortung.android.app.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.graphics.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.content.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
java.net.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
org.blitzortung.android.data.beans.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: VarCouldBeVal
smells.description: Var declaration could be val.

instances.message: Variable 'radius' could be val.
Variable 'section' could be val.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class VersionComponent defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.description: Optional braces in when expression

instances.message: Optional braces in when expression

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function buildTimeString has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function doInBackground has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class Parameters contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called isRealtime
The data class ResultEvent contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called containsRealtimeData
The data class RasterParameters contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called getCenterLongitude
The data class RasterParameters contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called getCenterLatitude
The data class RasterParameters contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called getRect

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class DefaultStrike implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class RasterElement implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
